oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Here, we report a simple in-situ stepwise preparation of Au(core) Fe3O4 (shell) NPs through one-pot thermal decomposition by using metal acetate/acetylacetonate in a high boiling solvent. Furthermore, He La cells labeled with the surface functionalized core-shell NPs were successfully imaged with confocal laser scanning microscopy as well as respond to an external magnetic field by increasing the temperature of the surrounding environment (i.e., hypertheimia), which can be used therapeutically to treat cancer cells locally.
